1.0.name: wordpress/adsense-sidebar-widget
1.0.description:
with this widget / plugin you can easyly add an adsense banner to your wordpress sidebar. no coding needet! no editing of yout template needed. you can choose between text banners and image banners

install & go :-)

!USE THIS CODE AT YOUR OWN RISK!

Here you can see how easy the config of the adsense wordpress plugin / widget is.
